AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_labelShort} went to a community college, majored in Liberal Arts, and graduated with unremarkable grades around the middle of {PAWN_possessive} class.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_labelShort} did not discover fire nor invent the wheel. {PAWN_labelShort} hunts. {PAWN_labelShort} gathers. {PAWN_pronoun} eats and sleeps. Occasionally, {PAWN_labelShort} tries to make more mouths to feed.
